information_required.app_instance: An instance of FastAPI or APIRouter where the subscription endpoint will be added.
information_required.path: The endpoint path for the subscription.
information_required.pubsub_name: The name of the Dapr pubsub component.
information_required.topic_name: The name of the topic to subscribe to.
information_required.additional_parameters: Optional parameters such as tags, metadata, dead_letter_topic, and openapi_extra for further customization of the subscription.

information_required.remove_dapr_data: A boolean flag indicating whether to remove Dapr metadata from incoming requests. Defaults to False.

information_required.dapr_instance: An instance of the DaprFastAPI class initialized with or without removing Dapr metadata.

information_required.app_instance: An instance of FastAPI to extract subscription information from.
information_required.dapr_instance: An instance of the DaprFastAPI class to use the extracted subscriptions.

information_required.app_instance: An instance of FastAPI where the /dapr/subscribe route will be generated.
information_required.dapr_instance: An instance of the DaprFastAPI class to generate the subscription route.
